examples: I usually eat breakfast at 7 am.
She doesn't eat meat because she's a vegetarian.
Eu geralmente como café da manhã às 7 horas.
Ela não come carne porque é vegetariana.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
The experience of food insecurity and hunger can lead to sadness and despair for many individuals and communities.
Feeling angry and frustrated with the lack of access to healthy and affordable food for many marginalized communities.
It can be surprising to learn about the environmental impact of our food choices and how they contribute to climate change.
The aroma of freshly baked bread or sizzling bacon can evoke feelings of comfort and nostalgia.
The tactile experience of eating with your hands or using utensils can bring a sense of pleasure and enjoyment to the act of eating.
The connection to cultural identity and tradition through food can be a source of pride and community for many individuals and groups.
